thread.title: Statue stolen from grave of Alabama first lady found; Facebook credited with recovery
thread.title_full: Statue stolen from grave of Alabama first lady found; Facebook credited with recovery

title: Statue stolen from grave of Alabama first lady found; Facebook credited with recovery
text:
Published By: Al.com: Birmingham - Today 
An Italian marble statue stolen from the grave of Alabama First Lady Mary Joe McGowin Patterson in Clanton was anonymously returned Tuesday....
